Package awesome.platform.shadows

This package provides utilities to add new shadows to Awesome.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AddShadow  
AddShadowGen  
AddShadowWriter The class is provided with a ShadowSpec, generates the aspect code by using AddShadowGen, and then writes the aspect with that code to this package.
ShadowSpec  
 

Package awesome.platform.shadows Description

This package provides utilities to add new shadows to Awesome. A new shadow may be added using the AddShadow#main method. The actual (aspect) code that adds the new shadows is also contained in this package.
